word:
Some in our day, by their attitude toward the law as revealed in Galatians, have brought a sad chapter into their life-experience. Repeat not the past. Let none indulge in speculative theories, or call attention to things that do not pertain to the great and solemn work of deciding their own eternal destiny. The twenty-third of Matthew describes the condition of those who are 
                                                                           1766
blinded, who can not discern the relative importance of things that they should understand.
